褖字的基本解释

褖
tuàn
古代一种边缘有装饰的礼服。

褖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuàn］
［《廣韻》通貫切，去换，透。］
“税4”的被通假字。
(1)王后燕居或进御时所穿之服。
(2)饰有边沿的衣服。为士的礼服或士妻等的命服。

褖字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褖； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1121第08
【唐韻】通貫切【集韻】【韻會】吐玩切，?音彖。【玉篇】后衣也。【釋名】褖衣，褖然黑色也。【詩·邶風·綠衣箋】綠當爲褖，褖衣黑，以素紗爲裏，今反以黃爲裏，非其禮制也。【儀禮·士喪禮】褖衣。【註】黑衣裳赤緣之謂褖，褖之言緣也，所以表袍者也。　【周記】作緣。　又【禮·玉藻註】褖或作稅。

褖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
褖字的起名意思

暂无。

Furry
Basic explanation of words
Furry
tuàn
An ancient dress with decorative edges.
Furry
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuàn］
["Guangyun" cuts through, exchanges, and through. ]
"Tax 4" is a false word.
(1) The clothes worn by the queen when she lives in or enters the imperial palace.
(2) Clothes decorated with borders. For the attire of the scholar or the order of the wife, etc.
Furry
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　褖; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1121 Page 08
【Tang Yun】Through-cutting 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Spit, play and cut,? Sound. 【Jade articles】The back clothes are also. [Release name] Coiled clothes, rich in black. 【Poetry·Beifeng·Green Clothes Notes】Green should be the fur, the fur is black, and the plain yarn is the inner. Today, the yellow is the inner. 【Rituals·Funeral】clothes. [Note] The black clothes and the red border are called 褖, and the words of the 褖 are also connected, so the ones who show the robe are also.　【Zhou Ji】make fate.　[Li·Yu Zao Note] 褖 or tax.
